name: Everyone Moves With You
description:
If you like a challenge then you've come to the right place. This won't be another easy to beat 2d pixel game. Challenge yourself in this fun, action packed game. Unlock new abilities and attack throughout the game and new enemies. With unique bosses to fight, each different from the last. Fight in this fantasy game and take down your foes. You'll travel through multiple different worlds, all sorts of different levels, enemies, weapons and so much more. With new levels being made often.

You play as a female warrior who can melee with her sword or throw axes as projectiles to kill enemies. As you progress you will unlock new ways to attack and take down your foes. You can also jump on most enemies heads to kill them. You will start at world 1 and fight through all the creatures. Once you get through there you can progress onto world 2. Which will give you lots of new things to unlock. With each world you travel to their will be many different new items, enemies, world styles, objects and many more. Take down your foes however you wish, but don't die. There is no one exact to complete each level. Every level can be beat many different ways.
